ygData.subject: EQ GROUP
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, im glad to see that theres a group for those of us that play EQ.  Just thought id tell you all a little about myself,  Im 42 yr old male, Ive been
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all, im glad to see that theres a group for those of us that
play EQ. Just thought id tell you all a little about myself, Im 42
yr old male, Ive been playing sense 1999, I started on the TT server
but now is the prexus sense tt and prexus merged. I have a son and a
daughter , my son is 18 and my daughter just turned 21. I am
currently in my 2nd semester back in college as my children have
grown. Now a little about my eq , i have 3 accts only because each
of my children played (we play alot as a family), currently im only
playing the one but i do 2 box at times when im in need of a healer or
slower. my favorate character is my 70 mage, we are currently
exploring and doing aa exp in the new expansion zones. Well i hope i
havent bored you all, it will be great sharing my eq exp with you
all, and asking for help also at times when im in need. God speed to
all of you in your journeys.

PEACE
